overview.text: Revelation, collapse of false structures, and honest rebuilding. Upright, The Tower points toward steady advancement that fits real life. Major Arcana archetype gives the tone and terrain. Expect to work with truth breaks illusion, stabilize essentials, and lean on honesty; use what already responds and let momentum build. Read this card as permission to move in a way that feels honest and well‑paced—visible results over grand gestures.

relationships.text: Connection feels alive and honest. Let truth breaks illusion, stabilize essentials, and lean on honesty guide how you show up; small, sincere acts matter here. Speak plainly, listen for the quiet truth, and move at a pace that keeps trust intact.

work.text: Progress favors craft, clear scope, and a result you can point to. Build around contingency mode, communicate clearly, and rebuild on facts; finish one meaningful piece and let it prove the direction. Share early, revise well, and protect time where real work happens.

finance.text: Make numbers you can live with and choices you respect. Aim resources toward emergency triage, prioritize shelter, and prevent repeat; trim what does not serve your life. Automate the good, read terms in daylight, and let steadiness quietly win.

health.text: Prefer routines your body trusts. Shape your week around acute care focus, remove hazards, and gentle recovery; keep changes gentle and repeatable. Recovery is part of progress; consistency outperforms intensity.

work.text: Drag shows up as too much scope and not enough finish. Cut to postmortem, resilience upgrades, and fail-safes; deliver a small slice that restores flow. Reduce handoffs, limit multitasking, and make quality visible.

health.text: Overreach or neglect hide in routine—bring them into the light. Ease into close call lesson, safety protocols, and gradual return; lower intensity, improve form, and rest on purpose. Start where you are; a kinder plan will carry you further.
